content.title: Cusco City Tour
description: Discover the cultural and architectural richness of the former capital of the Inca Empire with our Cusco City Tour. This experience is designed to immerse you in the history, traditions, and grandeur of the city’s main attractions and its surroundings.

During the tour, you will visit sacred temples, impressive Inca fortresses, and colonial constructions that reflect the fusion of two cultures. Accompanied by a professional guide, you will learn fascinating details about each site while enjoying a unique landscape in the heart of the Andes.
Get ready for an experience full of history, culture, and awe in every corner of Cusco.

days.title: Welcome and Cusco City Tour
days.subtitle: Machu Picchu
description: Machu Picchu, known as one of the New Seven Wonders of the World, is the most impressive legacy of the Inca civilization. Located atop a majestic mountain at 2,430 meters above sea level, this citadel combines architecture, history, and nature in a truly unique setting.

Discovered in 1911, Machu Picchu continues to captivate travelers from around the world with its mystical beauty and architectural perfection. During your visit, you will explore its temples, agricultural terraces, ceremonial enclosures, and viewpoints offering unparalleled views of the Andean landscape.
Every corner of Machu Picchu tells a story that takes you back to Inca times, making this experience an unforgettable memory.
schedule: 07:00 – 11:00: Arrival in Cusco and transfer to the hotel. Time for acclimatization.
13:00 – 18:30: City Tour: Cathedral, Qoricancha (Temple of the Sun), Sacsayhuamán, Qenqo, Puka Pukara, and Tambomachay.
Night: Free dinner and overnight stay in Cusco.

days.title: Machu Picchu – Wonder of the World
days.subtitle: Machu Picchu

schedule: 08:00 – 11:00: Guided tour of Machu Picchu (approx. 2 hours).

days.title: Sacred Valley and Return
schedule: 07:00 – 16:00: Sacred Valley excursion: Pisac, Urubamba (buffet lunch), Ollantaytambo.
16:30: Return to Cusco and transfer to the airport.

includes: Entrance tickets (Tourist Ticket and Machu Picchu)
2 nights hotel accommodation in Cusco with breakfast
Buffet lunch in the Sacred Valley

schedule: Wear comfortable clothing, sunscreen, a hat, and bring a camera.
Arrive at least 24 hours before the tour for acclimatization.
